Link.doc: generic - all structs which are put into linked lists begin with this.

fields.next: reference on the next element in linked list
fields.prev: reference on previous element in linked list

LinkData.doc: simple subclass of Link--use this when it is not worth defining a custom one...

ListBase.doc:
This is the entry point to work with linked lists. It is for 
			example used in libraries {@link Library}, to provide a reference 
			to the first and the last element of a linked list of library objects.
